SearchCarrierEventAbbreviatedRecord.MainSQL: SELECT CSTID , CSTSTAT AS 상태 , LOTID , PROCID , EQPTID , PORT_ID , RACK_ID , EVENT_CODE , EVENT_TYPE_CODE , TRF_END_CODE , FINL_TO_EQPTID , FINL_TO_PORT_ID , INSUSER , TO_CHAR(INSDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS INSDTTM , TO_CHAR(UPDDTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDDTTM FROM TB_MHS_TRF_EVENT_HIST WHERE 1=1 +Option2 +Option3 ORDER BY INSDTTM DESC +Option1
